Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #71 buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial. 

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to utility maintenance at Commercial/103rd.

Headline: #94 Temporary Northbound Reroute near Western/ 47th
ShortDescription: Northbound #94 buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Orange Line Terminal, 51st, and California due to street blockage near Western/47th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #94 buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Orange Line Terminal, 51st, and California due to street blockage near Western/47th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Reroute at King Drive/ 89th Place
ShortDescription: 3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via King Drive, 89th, Indiana, 90th, King Drive, due to street blockage

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via King Drive, 89th, Indiana, 90th, King Drive, due to street blockage 

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Northbound Reroute near 119th/Watkins
ShortDescription: 119 Michigan/119th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 119th, Vincennes, 115th, Marshfield, and 119th due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#119 Michigan/119th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 119th, Vincennes, 115th, Marshfield, and 119th due to street blockage.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #52 Kedzie/California Temporary Reroute at Kedzie/Fulton
ShortDescription: 52 Kedzie/California buses are temp rerouted in both directions via Kedzie, Madison, Sacramento, Franklin and Kedzie, due to street blockage near Kedzie/Fulton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#52 Kedzie/California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Kedzie, Madison, Sacramento, Franklin and Kedzie, then resume their normal route. due to street blockage near Kedzie/Fulton.

Allow extra travel time.
